game.name: Two Worlds II Strategy Guide
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Downloadable Content, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The world of Antaloor is truly enormous - but now you can never get lost! The official "Two Worlds II" Strategy Guide - straight from the developers - will make sure that you never miss an adventure, complete every quest and never again get into a desperate situation in combat!
